coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_SEARCHES_ALL
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND ((saved:query IS NOT NULL AND saved:queryLanguage IS NOT NULL) OR saved:providerName IS NOT NULL) AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed = 0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_SEARCHES_ALL_PAGE_PROVIDER
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND ((saved:query IS NOT NULL AND saved:queryLanguage IS NOT NULL) OR saved:providerName IS NOT NULL) AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed = 0 AND saved:providerName = :pageProvider

coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND cvd:contentViewName IS NOT NULL AND dc:creator = ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed = 0 AND SORTED_COLUMN IS NOT NULL
